text: Ara apani nijeke dhairyera sathe rakhabena tadera'i sansarge yara sakala o sandhyaya dake tadera rabake tamra santusti labhera uddese [1] ebam apani duniyara jibanera sobha kamana kare tadera theke apanara drsti phiriye nebena na [2]. Ara apani tara anugatya karabena na--- yara cittake amara amadera smarane amanoyogi kare diyechi, ye tara kheyala-khusira anusarana kareche o yara karma binasta hayeche
